attributes.action: Ask the BBFC to reconsider their decision not to classify the "Manhunt 2"(Wii,PS2) video game
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This highly anticipated game should be allowed for sale to adults. 

It is not intended for children and can be labeled clearly to indicate the nature of the game to members of public who do not want to be exposed to this kind of experience.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
